means: 阳光地带（美国南部和西南部地区，全年大部分时间气候温暖）

sentence.Network_en: During the last recession, migration to the sunbelt accelerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 在上个经济萧条期，人们向美国南部阳光地带移民的速度加快了。

sentence.Network_en: In the Sunbelt states competition for land and water will intensify.
sentence.Network_cn: 在阳光充足地带的一些州,对土地和水的争夺会很激烈.

sentence.Network_en: Chrysler was weak in the sunbelt, with its younger and more affluent drivers.
sentence.Network_cn: 克莱斯勒公司的车子在阳光地带那些青年人和有钱人心中已经不吃香了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 虽然在1982年有文章称,美国北部霜冻地带(FrostBelt)经济面临瓦解,而阳光地带(SunBelt)将是唯一可能成长的区域,但是那年《公司》杂志排行榜上的100家公司,只有1/3.
The Inspiration of Sunbelt in U.S.A. to Urbanization Strategy in West China美国“阳光带”的崛起对中国西部城市化战略的启示

entry.tran: 阳光地带(尤指美国南部地区)
entry.def: The warmer, sunnier parts of a country or continent, especially the southern United States, are sometimes referred to as the sunbelt .

example.ex: During the last recession, migration to the sunbelt accelerated.
example.tran: 在上个经济萧条期，人们向美国南部阳光地带移民的速度加快了。

means.word_mean: 1. states in the south and southwest that have a warm climate and tend to be politically conservative

auth_sentence.content: I have lived in "Sunbelt" states exclusively since graduating college.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have lived in "Sunbelt" states exclusively since graduating college.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have lived in "Sunbelt" states exclusively since graduating college.

auth_sentence.content: The friends of cities would be wiser to learn from Sunbelt sprawl than to mindlessly denigrate its inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content: The friends of cities would be wiser to learn from Sunbelt sprawl than to mindlessly denigrate its inhabitants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The friends of cities would be wiser to learn from Sunbelt sprawl than to mindlessly denigrate its inhabitants.

auth_sentence.content: "People can only sit on the sidelines for so long," says Robert Bourgeois, chief executive of Sunbelt of Louisiana.
auth_sentence.res_content: "People can only sit on the sidelines for so long," says Robert Bourgeois, chief executive of Sunbelt of Louisiana.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "People can only sit on the sidelines for so long," says Robert Bourgeois, chief executive of Sunbelt of Louisiana.
